name: The Campaign against Super SZZT: Special Edition
name_original: The Campaign against Super SZZT: Special Edition
description:
The Campaign against Super ZZT is a recently-discovered ZZT world (date unknown)  which earnestly tries to convince its players (in all caps) not to use it and switch back to ordinary ZZT.

Now, in a fashion that was popular with the ZZT community in the past, this older ZZT world has been updated with better graphics using a wider colour palette and some extra content for you to enjoy!

In the end, Super ZZT never became as popular as its predecessor but whether this passionate work influenced its decline is lost to history.

How to play

Select (K)eyboard and (C)olor when starting the game and P to start playing. From there on, it's more or less like Bitsy. Use the arrow keys to move and touch things to interact with them.

The original Campaign can be played at:

 https://museumofzzt.com/play/c/TIPS.ZIP
